Articles.Content:
I'm looking for the last release of CIT-BAM (last file was BAM-1.1.1.zip)

If you have it, or even have it installed, could you get it to me please?

thanks

Had some nice people get me the BAM source, now 

Still looking for the Govfunding, and the latest course for Chopit.

I heard from Marce, he has graciously given me permission to resurrect whitchever mods of his I want.
